memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const float *alpha, const float *x, rocblas_int incx, const float *y, rocblas_int incy, float *A, rocblas_int lda)
memberdef.name: rocblas_sger

detaileddescription.para: xHE(SY)MV performs the matrix-vector operation: y := alpha*A*x + beta*y,
where alpha and beta are scalars, x and y are n element vectors and A is an n by n Hermitian(Symmetric) matrix.

handle
rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
uplo
rocblas_fill. specifies whether the upper or lower
n
rocblas_int.
alpha
specifies the scalar alpha.
A
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU.
lda
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of A.
x
pointer storing vector x on the GPU.
incx
specifies the increment for the elements of x.
beta
specifies the scalar beta.
y
pointer storing vector y on the GPU.
incy
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of y.
BLAS Level 2 API
xGER performs the matrix-vector operations A := A + alpha*x*y**T
where alpha is a scalars, x and y are vectors, and A is an m by n matrix.

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
pointer storing vector x on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of x.
pointer storing vector y on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of y.
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of A.

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const double *alpha, const double *x, rocblas_int incx, const double *y, rocblas_int incy, double *A, rocblas_int lda)
memberdef.name: rocblas_dger
